channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Slumped manhole cover on newly laid tarmac, 31st July
item.description:
Slumped manhole cover on newly laid tarmac, causing vehicles to shake. Outside Starbucks and circled in yellow. RBKC replied to ask for images and this is the only way I can provide

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Pembridge Road, Notting Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Litter - alleyway Chipperfield Road to Silverdale Road, 31st July
item.description:
There is a lot of litter in the alleyway between Chipperfield Road and Silverdale Road, including the cul-de-sac of Ravenscourt Road. The Silverdale Road end was cleaned last Thursday but the rest wasn't. Please note that this is scheduled for weekly cleaning and this is not being done. Please could this be rectified, both with remedial action and investigation as to why it is being missed from routine cleaning? Please note that this is due to be cleaned weekly on a Thursday and is shown on the street cleaning map as "CHIPPERFIELD ROAD - ST MARY CRAY Footway". (This is St Paul's Cray and this footway is between Chipperfield Road and Silverdale Road and includes the cul-de-sac part of Ravenscourt Road.)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 262-276, Chipperfield Road, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive pigeon fouling, 31st July
item.description:
Pavement covered in pigeon droppings. This is alongside Gayton Rd car park. I have reported many times before and it gets cleaned so this is an ongoing problem! Could it not be cleaned on a regular basis?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Knee Hill, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trampoline fly tipped in the park, 31st July
item.description:
Someone has fly tipped a trampoline in Bromley Palace Park. I’ve moved it to the Rochester Avenue entrance to make it easier for you to pick up. I spoke to security guards at both entrances and it did not come from there. So the only place it could come from would be someone’s back garden. There is only one house with a gate that backs onto the park (clearly this is something they shouldn’t have) they also have outside gym equipment in the said back garden. This is a gym trampoline.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
